trends: There have been no other sightings in South Vienna
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details I wentout to go to work and saw a bright light in the sky. I didnt know what it wasand thought of a UFO. I watched it for a little while and the big white lightgot dimmer and went completely out and a little red light was there. I went backin the house and when I came back out the dim white light was there again and Iwent to work.
